channel.title: Really hitting problem
channel.description:
idk what the hell else to do...
ok well my spell hits for 43 but doesnt drain HP!
[img]http://aycu12.webshots.com/image/45651/2006315844818209345_rs.jpg[/img]
WHAT CAN I DO TO MAKE IT DRAIN HP!

item.title: Really hitting problem
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

dodian

spell = 12939 1978 383 0 50 562 2 560 2 554 1 556 1 5698 13 67 43 50 Smoke_Rush
eg the 67 represents the hit diff…

it hits like that everytime the guys h as 40 hp it hits 43 and drains no hp.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2008, 06:22:28 PM[/size][hr]sorry snake i answered for you but i have the same problem

item.title: Really hitting problem

item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Two things,

  1. Does it always do that? The guy could have 99/somethinglowerthan99hp(lol)
  2. Or, you could edit your spells…Are you using a source? if so, which?
